LIST.TITLE: Voice Agents
LIST.DESCRIPTION: Manage Vapi.ai voice agents for your inboxes
LIST.EMPTY_STATE_DESCRIPTION: Create your first voice agent to start handling incoming calls with AI

FORM.NEW_DESCRIPTION: Create a new AI voice agent to handle calls automatically
FORM.IMPORT_DESCRIPTION: Already have an agent in Vapi? Enter its ID to import the configuration automatically.
FORM.NAME: Agent Name
FORM.FIRST_MESSAGE_PLACEHOLDER: Hello! How can I help you today?
FORM.FIRST_MESSAGE_HELP: The greeting message when the agent answers the call
FORM.SYSTEM_PROMPT_PLACEHOLDER: You are a helpful customer support assistant. Be concise and friendly.
FORM.SYSTEM_PROMPT_HELP: Instructions that define the agent's behavior and personality
FORM.VOICE_ID_HELP: Get voice IDs from your provider's dashboard (ElevenLabs, Azure, etc.)
FORM.TRANSCRIBER_HELP: Select the language for speech recognition - important for accuracy
FORM.PHONE_NUMBER_HELP: Optional: dedicated phone number for this agent

MESSAGES.DELETE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"?
MESSAGES.IMPORT_ERROR: Failed to import agent from Vapi. Check the ID and try again.
MESSAGES.IMPORT_ID_REQUIRED: Please enter a Vapi Agent ID
MESSAGES.IMPORT_SELECT_INBOX: Please select an inbox before importing
